title: Neocis’ Yomi platform completes over 100,000 osteotomies
description:
The Yomi platform combines real-time haptic guidance, pre-operative digital planning, and intra-operative adaptability.

The post Neocis’ Yomi platform completes over 100,000 osteotomies appeared first on The Robot Report.
